'''0.2.2''' is a server version of [[Java Edition Alpha]] released with the [[Halloween Update]] ([[Alpha v1.2.0|client v1.2.0]]) on October 30, 2010, to fix bugs.

== Fixes ==
* Redstone performance updated.
* Door animation fixes.
* Several performance bugs fixed.
* Rails no longer cause a crash.
